summary: Conrad is a combat barbarian follower
descriptionHtml:
Conrad is a combat barbarian, that comes equipped with male Jarl clothing and a skyforge steel greatsword. He is built to wear light armor, proficient with all weapon types, except magika. 

He is essential and capable of being married. He levels with you, too.

He can use one low level healing spell to heal himself. 

Speed increase 25% so they don\'t get left behind.

Located in Riverwood, and may be found throughout the town.

He is best combined with the Faren Companion Mod as they are modeled after the husband and wife dev team. 

This is a working BETA and direct support is not available. 


Check out my other mods:
Snowflake Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24849
Kenzie Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24821
Spot Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24796
Faren Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24754
author: Faren Russell
